column4: I'm looking for some kind of enterprise search engine.  Does someone have a recomendation?
what do you mean "enterprise search engine"
something "googleish" for inside the firewall search.
Can I make it private enough for my corporate masters?
you mean like filter out certain things?
I see a google appliance and I see an enterprise search.
oh, you arent being clear about your needs.
probably not.  I;ll put together a needs analisys and submit it for review.
i dont understand why you cant lock down the netowkr
I think we might be talking at cross purposes.
which is why i dont understand
maybe google has some feature that can be used to index our "intranet" websites without letting them be public.  I'm not familiar with those.
ah, you are asking about your intranet LOL
I agree that I was not clear.
do you have some type of website or files you are sharing?
thanks for all your comments.  I'll go look for myself.
